Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Equa.abstract: Checks if two kinds are equal, given that the enclosed value type conforms to Equatable.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: foldLeft(_:_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Eagerly folds this value to a summary value from left to right.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: foldRight(_:_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Lazily folds this value to a summary value from right to left.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: reduceLeftToOption(_:_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Reduces the elements of this structure down to a single value by applying the provided transformation and aggregation funtions in a left-associative manner.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: reduceRightToOption(_:_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Reduces the elements of this structure down to a single value by applying the provided transformation and aggregation functions in a right-associative manner.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: reduceLeftOption(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Reduces the elements of this structure down to a single value by applying the provided aggregation function in a left-associative manner.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: reduceRightOption(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Reduces the elements of this structure down to a single value by applying the provided aggregation function in a right-associative manner.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: foldMap(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Transforms the elements of this structure to a type with a Monoid instance and folds them using the empty and combine methods of such Monoid instance.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: traverse_(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Traverses this structure of values, transforming them with a provided function and discarding the result of its effect.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: sequence_()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Traverses this structure of effects, performing them and discarding their result.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: find(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Looks for an element that matches a given predicate.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: exists(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Checks if any element in this structure matches a given predicate.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: forall(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Checks if all elements in this structure match a given predicate.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: isEmpty
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Checks if this structure of values is empty.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: nonEmpty
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Checks if this structure of values is not empty.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: foldM(_:_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Performs a monadic left fold from the source context to the target monad.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: foldMapM(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Performs a monadic left fold by mapping the values in this structure to ones in the target monad context and using the Monoid instance to combine them.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: get(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Obtains a specific element of a structure of elements given its indexed position.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: count
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Counts how many elements this structure contains.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: foldK()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: reduceK()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: asArray()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Combines the elements of this structure into an ArrayK.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: fold()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Folds this structure of values provided that its type has an instance of Monoid.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.name: combineAll()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Folda.abstract: Folds this structure of values provided that its type has an instance of Monoid.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.name: map(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.abstract: Creates a new value transforming the type using the provided function, preserving the structure of the original type.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.name: lift(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.abstract: Given a function, provides a new function lifted to the context type implementing this instance of Functor.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.name: void()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.abstract: Replaces the value type by the Void type.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.name: fproduct(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.abstract: Transforms the value type and pairs it with its original value.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.name: as(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.abstract: Transforms the value type with a constant value.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.name: tupleLeft(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.abstract: Transforms the value type by making a tuple with a new constant value to the left of the original value type.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.name: tupleRight(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A7Funct.abstract: Transforms the value type by making a tuple with a new constant value to the right of the original value type.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A13Func.name: mapFilter(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A13Func.abstract: Maps the value/s in the context implementing this instance, filtering out the ones resulting in Option.none.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A13Func.name: flattenOption(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A13Func.abstract: Removes the Option.none value/s in this context and extracts the Option.some ones.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A13Func.name: filter(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A13Func.abstract: Filters out the value/s in this context that do not match the given predicate.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Invar.name: imap(_:_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Invar.abstract: Transforms the value type using the functions provided.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.name: flatMap(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.abstract: Sequentially compose this computation with another one, passing any value produced by the first as an argument to the second.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.name: stackSafeFlatMap(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.abstract: A stack safe version of flatMap, based on tailRecM.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.name: flatten()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.abstract: Flattens a nested structure of the context implementing this instance into a single layer.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.name: followedBy(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.abstract: Sequentially compose with another computation, discarding the value produced by the this one.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.name: followedByEval(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.abstract: Sequentially compose this computation with a potentially lazy one, discarding the value produced by this one.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.name: forEffect(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.abstract: Sequentially compose with another computation, discarding the value produced by the received one.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.name: forEffectEval(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.abstract: Sequentially compose with a potentially lazy computation, discarding the value produced by the received one.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.name: mproduct(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.abstract: Pair the result of this computation with the result of applying a function to such result.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.name: flatTap(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.abstract: Applies a monadic function and discard the result while keeping the effect.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.name: ifM(_:_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.abstract: Conditionally apply a closure based on the boolean result of this computation.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A12Mona.name: unite(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A12Mona.abstract: Fold over the inner structure to combine all of the values with our combine method inherited from `MonoidK.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.name: var()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.abstract: Creates a bound variable in the monadic context of this kind for the specified type.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Mona.name: ensure(_:_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Mona.abstract: Checks if the value of this computation matches a predicate, raising an error if not.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Mona.name: flatTapError(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Mona.abstract: Applies a monadic function to an effect discarding the output.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.name: empty
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.abstract: Obtains an empty element in this context.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.name: local(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.abstract: Executes this computation in a modified environment.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.name: reader(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.abstract: Retrieves a function of the current environment.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Mona.name: get()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Mona.abstract: Retrieves the state from the internals of the monad.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Mona.name: state(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Mona.abstract: Embeds a state action into the monad.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Mona.name: inspect(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Mona.abstract: Retrieves a specific component of the state.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Mona.name: liftF(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Mona.abstract: Lift a computation from the F monad to this monad.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.name: tell(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.abstract: Produces a new value of the side stream of data.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.name: listen()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.abstract: Adds the side stream of data to the result of this computation.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.name: pass(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.abstract: Performs a computation and transforms the side stream of data.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.name: listens(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.abstract: Performs this computation and transforms the side stream of data, pairing it with the result of this computation.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.name: censor(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Mona.abstract: Transforms the side stream of data of this computation.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A17NonE.name: split()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A17NonE.abstract: Divides this structure of values into a tuple that represents the first value of the structure (first component of the tuple) and the rest of values of the structure (second component of the tuple)

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Reduc.name: reduceLeftTo(_:_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Reduc.abstract: Eagerly reduces this structure of values from left to right, also performing a transformation of values.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Reduc.name: reduceRightTo(_:_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Reduc.abstract: Lazily reduces this structure of values from right to left, also performing a transformation of values.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Reduc.name: reduceMap(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Reduc.abstract: Reduces this structure of values by mapping them to a type with a Semigroup instance, and using its combination capabilities.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Reduc.name: reduce()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Reduc.abstract: Reduces this structure of values to a summary value using the combination capabilities of the Semigroup instance of the underlying type.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.name: select(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.abstract: Conditionally applies a computation based on the result of this computation.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.name: branch(ifLeft:ifRight:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.abstract: Evaluates one out of two computations based on the result of this computation.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.name: whenS(then:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.abstract: Evaluates the second computation when this evaluates to true.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.name: ifS(then:else:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.abstract: Evaluates one out of two computations based on the result of another computation.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.name: orS(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.abstract: A lifted version of lazy boolean or.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.name: andS(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.abstract: A lifted version of lazy boolean and.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.name: whileS()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A9Selec.abstract: Evaluates this computation as long as it evaluates to true.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Semi.name: combineK(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A10Semi.abstract: Combines this value with another value of the same type.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Semi.name: product(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A11Semi.abstract: Multiplicatively combine F and F into F<(A, B)>

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Trave.name: traverse(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Trave.abstract: Maps each element of this structure to an effect, evaluates them from left to right and collects the results.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Trave.name: sequence()
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Trave.abstract: Evaluate each effect in this structure of values and collects the results.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.name: flatTraverse(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A5Monad.abstract: A traverse followed by flattening the inner result.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Trave.name: scanLeft(initialState:f:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Trave.abstract: Maps each element of this structure using a stateful function.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Trave.name: scanLeft(initialState:f:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Trave.abstract: Maps each element of this structure using a stateful function.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Trave.name: scanLeftM(initialState:f:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Trave.abstract: Maps each element of this structure to an effect using a stateful function.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Trave.name: scanLeftM(initialState:f:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A8Trave.abstract: Maps each element of this structure to an effect using a stateful function.

Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A14Trav.name: traverseFilter(_:)
Classes/Kind.html#/s:3Bow4KindCA2A14Trav.abstract: A combined traverse and filter operation. Filtering is handled using Option instead of Bool so that the output can be different than the input type.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC4vo.name: void
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC4vo.abstract: Creates a Fold that has no focus.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC12f.name: fromFoldable()
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC12f.abstract: Creates a Fold based on the instance of Foldable for F.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC7fo.name: foldMap(_:_:)
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC7fo.abstract: Map each foci to a type R and use a Monoid to fold the results.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC4si.name: size(_:)
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC4si.abstract: Counts the number of foci in the source.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC6fo.name: forAll(_:_:)
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC6fo.abstract: Checks if all foci match a predicate.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC6ch.name: choice(_:)
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC6ch.abstract: Joins to Fold with the same focus.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC4le.name: left()
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC4le.abstract: Creates the sum of this Fold with another type, placing this as the left side.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC5ri.name: right()
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC5ri.abstract: Creates the sum of this Fold with another type, placing this as the right side.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC4fi.name: find(_:_:)
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC4fi.abstract: Finds the first focus that matches a predicate.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC6ex.name: exists(_:_:)
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldC6ex.abstract: Checks if any focus in the provided source match a predicate.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCA2A.name: at(_:)
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCA2A.abstract: Focuses on a specific index of this fold.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCA2A.name: every
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCA2A.abstract: Provides a fold over all elements of the foci of this fold.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCA2A.name: index(_:)
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCA2A.abstract: Provides a fold focused on an index of the focus of this fold.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCA2A.name: subscript(_:)
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCA2A.abstract: Provides a fold focused on an index of the focus of this fold.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCAAq.name: codiagonal
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCAAq.abstract: Provides a Fold that takes either an S or an S and strips the choice of S.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCAAq.name: select(_:)
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCAAq.abstract: Provides a Fold based on a predicate on the source.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCAA0.name: fold(_:)
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCAA0.abstract: Folds all foci into a summary value using its instance of Monoid.

Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCAA0.name: combineAll(_:)
Classes/Fold.html#/s:9BowOptics4FoldCAA0.abstract: Folds all foci into a summary value using its instance of Monoid.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Composes a Getter with another Getter.
Composes a Getter with a Lens.
Composes a Getter with an Iso.
Composes a Getter with a Fold.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: init(get:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Initializes a Getter.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: get(_:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Obtains the focus for a given source.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: choice(_:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Joins two Getters with the same focus.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: split(_:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Pairs two disjoint Getters.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: zip(_:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Zips two Getters with the same source.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: first()
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Pairs this Getter with another type, placing this as the first element.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: second()
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Pairs this Getter with another type, placing this as the second element.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: left()
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Creates the sum of this Getter with another type, placing this as the left side.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: right()
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Creates the sum of this Getter with another type, placing this as the right side.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: compose(_:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Composes this Getter with a Getter.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: compose(_:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Composes this Getter with a Lens.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: compose(_:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Composes this Getter with an Iso.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: compose(_:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Composes this Getter with a Fold.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: asFold
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Converts this Getter into a Fold.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: find(_:_:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Obtains the focus if it matches a predicate.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: exists(_:_:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Checks if the focus matches a predicate.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: ask()
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Extracts the value viewed through the get function.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: toReader()
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Extracts the value viewed through the get function.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: asks(_:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Extracts the value viewed through the get function and applies the provided function to it.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: extract()
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Extracts the focus view through the Getter.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: toState()
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Extracts the focus view through the Getter.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: extractMap(_:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Extracts the focus view through the Getter and applies the provided function to it.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: at(_:)
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Focuses on a specific index of this getter.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: identity
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Provides an identity Getter.

Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.name: codiagonal
Classes/Getter.html#/s:9BowOptics6Getter.abstract: Provides a Getter that takes either S or S and strips the choice of S.

Classes/BoundSetter.html#/s:9BowOptics11.name: modify(_:)
Classes/BoundSetter.html#/s:9BowOptics11.abstract: Modifies the source of the bound setter.

Classes/BoundSetter.html#/s:9BowOptics11.name: set(_:)
Classes/BoundSetter.html#/s:9BowOptics11.abstract: Sets a new value for the focus.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: void
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Provides an AffineTraversal that never sees its focus.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: getOrModify(_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Gets the focus or the modified source.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: modifyF(_:_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Modifies the focus of a PAffineTraversal with an Applicative function.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: liftF(_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Lifts an Applicative function operating on the focus to one operating on the source.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: getOption(_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Gets the focus or Option.none if it is not present.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: getOptional(_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Gets the focus or nil if it is not present.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: setOption(_:_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Sets a new value for the focus.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: setOptional(_:_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Sets a new value for the focus.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: isEmpty(_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Checks if the provided source is empty (i.e. does not have a focus).

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: nonEmpty(_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Checks if the provided source is non-empty (i.e. does have a focus).

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: choice(_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Joins with a PAffineTraversal with the same focus.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: first()
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Pairs this PAffineTraversal with another type, placing this as the first element.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: second()
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Pairs this PAffineTraversal with another type, placing this as the second element.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: lift(_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Lifts a function modifying the focus to a function modifying the source.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: modifyOption(_:_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Modifies the source with a function if it matches.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: find(_:_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Retrieves the focus if it matches a predicate.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: exists(_:_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Checks if the focus matches a predicate.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: all(_:_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Checks if the focus matches a predicate.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.name: extractMap(_:)
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html#/s:9BowOpt.abstract: Extracts the focus viewed through the PAffineTraversal and applies the provided function to it.

Classes/PAffineTraversal.html.name: PAffineTraversal
Classes/PAffineTraversal.html.abstract: An AffineTraversal is an optic that allows to see into a structure and getting, setting or modifying an optional focus.

Classes/BoundSetter.html.name: BoundSetter
Classes/BoundSetter.html.abstract: A BoundSetter is a Setter that is already bound to a concrete source.

Classes/Getter.html.name: Getter
Classes/Getter.html.abstract: A Getter is an optic that allows to see into a structure and getting a focus.

Classes/Fold.html.name: Fold
Classes/Fold.html.abstract: A Fold is an optic that allows to focus into a structure and get multiple results.

Classes/Kind.html.name: Kind
Classes/Kind.html.abstract: Simulates a Higher-Kinded Type in Swift with 1 type argument.

Classes/StateT.html.name: StateT
Classes/StateT.html.abstract: StateT transformer represents operations that need to write and read a state through a computation or effect.

Classes/ArrayK.html.name: ArrayK
Classes/ArrayK.html.abstract: ArrayK is a Higher Kinded Type wrapper over Swift arrays.

Classes/Const.html.name: Const
Classes/Const.html.abstract: Constant data type. Represents a container of two types, holding a value of the left type that remains constant, regardless of the transformation applied to it.

Classes/EitherK.html.name: EitherK
Classes/EitherK.html.abstract: EitherK is a sum type for kinds. Represents a type where you can hold either a Kind<F, A> or a Kind<G, A>.

Classes/Either.html.name: Either
Classes/Either.html.abstract: Sum type of types A and B. Represents a value of either one of those types, but not both at the same time. Values of type A are called left; values of type B are called right.

Classes/Id.html.name: Id
Classes/Id.html.abstract: The identity data type represents a context of having no effect on the type it wraps. A instance of Id<A> is isomorphic to an instance of A; it is just wrapped without any additional information.

Classes/Ior.html.name: Ior
Classes/Ior.html.abstract: Ior represents an inclusive-or of two different types. It may have a value of the left type, the right type or both at the same time.

Classes/NonEmptyArray.html.name: NonEmptyArray
Classes/NonEmptyArray.html.abstract: A NonEmptyArray is an array of elements that guarantees to have at least one element.

Classes/Option.html.name: Option
Classes/Option.html.abstract: Represents optional values. Instances of this type may represent the presence of a value (some) or absence of it (none). This type is isomorphic to native Swift Optional<A> (usually written A?), with the addition of behaving as a Higher Kinded Type.

Classes/Try.html.name: Try
Classes/Try.html.abstract: Describes the result of an operation that may have thrown errors or succeeded. The type parameter corresponds to the result type of the operation.

Classes/Validated.html.name: Validated
Classes/Validated.html.abstract: Validated is a data type to represent valid and invalid values. It is similar to Either, but with error accumulation in the invalid case.

Classes/PIso.html.name: PIso
Classes/PIso.html.abstract: An Iso is a loss less invertible optic that defines an isomorphism between a type S and A.

Classes/PLens.html.name: PLens
Classes/PLens.html.abstract: A Lens (or Functional Reference) is an optic that can focus into a structure for getting, setting or modifying the focus (target).

Classes/PPrism.html.name: PPrism
Classes/PPrism.html.abstract: A Prism is a loss less invertible optic that can look into a structure and optionally find its focus. It is mostly used for finding a focus that is only present under certain conditions, like in a sum type.

Classes/PSetter.html.name: PSetter
Classes/PSetter.html.abstract: A Setter is an optic that allows to see into a structure and set or modify its focus.

Classes/PTraversal.html.name: PTraversal
Classes/PTraversal.html.abstract: A Traversal is an optic that allows to see into a structure with 0 to N foci.

Classes.html#/s:10BowGeneric14ForCoprodu.name: ForCoproduct10
Classes.html#/s:10BowGeneric14ForCoprodu.abstract: Witness for the Coproduct10 data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/Coproduct10.html.name: Coproduct10
Classes/Coproduct10.html.abstract: Represents a sum type of 10 different types.

Classes.html#/s:10BowGeneric13ForCoprodu.abstract: Witness for the Coproduct2 data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/Coproduct2.html.name: Coproduct2
Classes/Coproduct2.html.abstract: Represents a sum type of 2 different types.

Classes/Coproduct4.html.abstract: Represents a sum type of 4 different types.

Classes.html#/s:10BowGeneric13ForCoprodu.abstract: Witness for the Coproduct5 data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/Coproduct5.html.name: Coproduct5
Classes/Coproduct5.html.abstract: Represents a sum type of 5 different types.

Classes.html#/s:10BowGeneric13ForCoprodu.name: ForCoproduct6
Classes.html#/s:10BowGeneric13ForCoprodu.abstract: Witness for the Coproduct6 data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/Coproduct6.html.name: Coproduct6
Classes/Coproduct6.html.abstract: Represents a sum type of 6 different types.

Classes.html#/s:10BowGeneric13ForCoprodu.name: ForCoproduct7
Classes.html#/s:10BowGeneric13ForCoprodu.abstract: Witness for the Coproduct7 data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/Coproduct7.html.name: Coproduct7
Classes/Coproduct7.html.abstract: Represents a sum type of 7 different types.

Classes.html#/s:10BowGeneric13ForCoprodu.name: ForCoproduct8
Classes.html#/s:10BowGeneric13ForCoprodu.abstract: Witness for the Coproduct8 data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/Coproduct8.html.name: Coproduct8
Classes/Coproduct8.html.abstract: Represents a sum type of 8 different types.

Classes.html#/s:10BowGeneric13ForCoprodu.name: ForCoproduct9
Classes.html#/s:10BowGeneric13ForCoprodu.abstract: Witness for the Coproduct9 data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/Coproduct9.html.name: Coproduct9
Classes/Coproduct9.html.abstract: Represents a sum type of 9 different types.

Classes.html#/s:7BowFree9ForCofreeC.name: ForCofree
Classes.html#/s:7BowFree9ForCofreeC.abstract: Witness for the Cofree data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/CofreePartial.html.name: CofreePartial
Classes/CofreePartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Cofree type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/Cofree.html.name: Cofree
Classes/Cofree.html.abstract: Cofree is a type that, given any Functor, is able to provide a Comonad instance, that can be interpreted into a more restrictive one.

Classes.html#/s:7BowFree03ForB0C.name: ForFree
Classes.html#/s:7BowFree03ForB0C.abstract: Witness for the Free<F, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/FreePartial.html.name: FreePartial
Classes/FreePartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Free type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/Free.html.name: Free
Classes/Free.html.abstract: Free is a type that, given any Functor, is able to provide a Monad instance, that can be interpreted into a more restrictive one.

Classes.html#/s:7BowFree10ForProgramC.name: ForProgram
Classes.html#/s:7BowFree10ForProgramC.abstract: Witness for the Program<F, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/ProgramPartial.html.name: ProgramPartial
Classes/ProgramPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Program type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/Program.html.name: Program
Classes/Program.html.abstract: Program is a type that, given any type constructor, is able to provide a Monad instance, that can be interpreted into a more restrictive one.

Classes/Atomic.html.name: Atomic
Classes/Atomic.html.abstract: An atomically modifiable reference to a value

Classes/Kleisli.html.name: Kleisli
Classes/Kleisli.html.abstract: Kleisli represents a function with the signature (D) -> Kind<F, A>.

Classes/KleisliPartial.html.name: KleisliPartial
Classes/KleisliPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Kleisli type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes.html#/s:10BowEffects5ForIOC.name: ForIO
Classes.html#/s:10BowEffects5ForIOC.abstract: Witness for the IO<E, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/IOPartial.html.name: IOPartial
Classes/IOPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the IO type constructor, omitting the last parameters.

Classes/IO.html.name: IO
Classes/IO.html.abstract: An IO is a data type that encapsulates and suspends side effects producing values of type A or errors of type E.

Classes/Ref.html.name: Ref
Classes/Ref.html.abstract: Ref is an asynchronous, concurrent mutable reference in the context of F holding a value of type A. Provides safe concurrent access and modification of its content. Refis a purely functional wrapper over an Atomic<A> in context F that is always initialized to a value.

Classes.html#/s:10BowEffects11ForResourc.name: ForResource
Classes.html#/s:10BowEffects11ForResourc.abstract: Witness for the Resource<F, A> type. To be used in simulated Higher Data Types.

Classes/ResourcePartial.html.name: ResourcePartial
Classes/ResourcePartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Resource type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/Resource.html.name: Resource
Classes/Resource.html.abstract: Resource models resource allocation and releasing. It is specially useful when multiple resources that depend on each other need to be acquired and later released in reverse order. Whn a resource is created, one can make use of the use method to run a computation with the resource. The finalizers are guaranteed to run afterwards in reverse order of acquisition.

Classes/Schedule.html.name: Schedule
Classes/Schedule.html.abstract: A stateful, effectful and recurring schedule of actions.

Classes.html#/s:5BowRx9ForMaybeKC.name: ForMaybeK
Classes.html#/s:5BowRx9ForMaybeKC.abstract: Witness for the MaybeK<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/MaybeK.html.name: MaybeK
Classes/MaybeK.html.abstract: MaybeK is a Higher Kinded Type wrapper over RxSwift’s Maybe data type.

Classes.html#/s:5BowRx14ForObservableKC.name: ForObservableK
Classes.html#/s:5BowRx14ForObservableKC.abstract: Witness for the ObservableK<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/ObservableK.html.name: ObservableK
Classes/ObservableK.html.abstract: ObservableK is a Higher Kinded Type wrapper over RxSwift’s Observable data type.

Classes.html#/s:5BowRx10ForSingleKC.name: ForSingleK
Classes.html#/s:5BowRx10ForSingleKC.abstract: Witness for the SingleK<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/SingleK.html.name: SingleK
Classes/SingleK.html.abstract: SingleK is a Higher Kinded Type wrapper over RxSwift’s SingleK data type.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow12ForCokleisliC.name: ForCokleisli
Classes.html#/s:3Bow12ForCokleisliC.abstract: Witness for the Cokleisli<F, A, B> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/CokleisliPartial.html.name: CokleisliPartial
Classes/CokleisliPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Cokleisli type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/Cokleisli.html.name: Cokleisli
Classes/Cokleisli.html.abstract: Cokleisli represents a function with the signature (Kind<F, A>) -> B.

Classes/CokleisliK.html.name: CokleisliK
Classes/CokleisliK.html.abstract: CokleisliK represents a function with the signature (Kind<F, A>) -> B

Classes.html#/s:3Bow12ForFunction0C.name: ForFunction0
Classes.html#/s:3Bow12ForFunction0C.abstract: Witness for the Function0<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/Function0.html.name: Function0
Classes/Function0.html.abstract: This data type acts as a wrapper over functions that receive no input and produce a value; namely, constant functions. This wrapper gives these functions capabilities to be used as a Higher Kinded Type and conform to typeclasses that have this requirement.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow12ForFunction1C.name: ForFunction1
Classes.html#/s:3Bow12ForFunction1C.abstract: Witness for the Function1<I, O> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types`.

Classes/Function1Partial.html.name: Function1Partial
Classes/Function1Partial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Function1 type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/Function1.html.name: Function1
Classes/Function1.html.abstract: This data type acts as a wrapper over functions. It receives two type parameters representing the input and output type of the function. The wrapper adds capabilities to use a function as a Higher Kinded Type and conform to typeclasses that have this requirement.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForKleisliC.name: ForKleisli
Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForKleisliC.abstract: Witness for the Kleisli<F, D, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow16ForLazyFunction1C.name: ForLazyFunction1
Classes.html#/s:3Bow16ForLazyFunction1C.abstract: Witness for the LazyFunction1<I, O> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types`.

Classes/LazyFunction1Partial.html.name: LazyFunction1Partial
Classes/LazyFunction1Partial.html.abstract: Partial application of the LazyFunction1 type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/LazyFunction1.html.name: LazyFunction1
Classes/LazyFunction1.html.abstract: This data type acts as a wrapper over functions, like Function1.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForArrayKC.name: ForArrayK
Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForArrayKC.abstract: Witness for the ArrayK<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow6ForCoTC.name: ForCoT
Classes.html#/s:3Bow6ForCoTC.abstract: Witness for the CoT<W, M, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types

Classes/CoTPartial.html.name: CoTPartial
Classes/CoTPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the CoT type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/CoT.html.name: CoT
Classes/CoT.html.abstract: CoT gives you the best pairing monad transformer for any Comonad W

Classes.html#/s:3Bow8ForConstC.name: ForConst
Classes.html#/s:3Bow8ForConstC.abstract: Witness for the Const<A, T> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/ConstPartial.html.name: ConstPartial
Classes/ConstPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Const type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/Coreader.html.name: Coreader
Classes/Coreader.html.abstract: Coreader is a special case of CoreaderT / Cokleisli where F is Id, so it is equivalent to functions (A) -> B.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow11ForCoyonedaC.name: ForCoyoneda
Classes.html#/s:3Bow11ForCoyonedaC.abstract: Witness for the Coyoneda data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/CoyonedaPartial.html.name: CoyonedaPartial
Classes/CoyonedaPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Coyoneda type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/Coyoneda.html.name: Coyoneda
Classes/Coyoneda.html.abstract: This type implements the dual version of the Yoneda lemma, stating that F is naturally isomorphic to Coyoneda.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow6ForDayC.name: ForDay
Classes.html#/s:3Bow6ForDayC.abstract: Witness for the Day<F, G, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/DayPartial.html.name: DayPartial
Classes/DayPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Day type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/Day.html.name: Day
Classes/Day.html.abstract: Day convolution of two Functors. It can be seen as the suspended version of a Pairing between Functors F and G, applied to specific values.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow14ForDictionaryKC.name: ForDictionaryK
Classes.html#/s:3Bow14ForDictionaryKC.abstract: Witness for the DictionaryK<K, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/DictionaryKPartial.html.name: DictionaryKPartial
Classes/DictionaryKPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the DictionaryK type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/DictionaryK.html.name: DictionaryK
Classes/DictionaryK.html.abstract: DictionaryK is a Higher Kinded Type wrapper over Swift dictionaries.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForEitherC.name: ForEither
Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForEitherC.abstract: Witness for the Either<A, B> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/EitherPartial.html.name: EitherPartial
Classes/EitherPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Either type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForEitherKC.name: ForEitherK
Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForEitherKC.abstract: Witness for the EitherK<F, G, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/EitherKPartial.html.name: EitherKPartial
Classes/EitherKPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the EitherK type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow7ForEndoC.name: ForEndo
Classes.html#/s:3Bow7ForEndoC.abstract: Witness for the Endo<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/Endo.html.name: Endo
Classes/Endo.html.abstract: Endo represents an Endomorphism; i.e., a function where the input and output type is the same.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow7ForEvalC.name: ForEval
Classes.html#/s:3Bow7ForEvalC.abstract: Witness for the Eval<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/Eval.html.name: Eval
Classes/Eval.html.abstract: Eval is a data type that describes a potentially lazy computation that produces a value.

Classes/Exists.html.name: Exists
Classes/Exists.html.abstract: Encodes the notion of existential type. Exists<F> is a wrapper around a Kind<F, X> value, where X is some type that is not exposed on Exists signature.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow5ForIdC.name: ForId
Classes.html#/s:3Bow5ForIdC.abstract: Witness for the Id<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow6ForIorC.name: ForIor
Classes.html#/s:3Bow6ForIorC.abstract: Witness for the Ior<A, B> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/IorPartial.html.name: IorPartial
Classes/IorPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Ior type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow8ForMooreC.name: ForMoore
Classes.html#/s:3Bow8ForMooreC.abstract: Witness for the Moore<E, V> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/MoorePartial.html.name: MoorePartial
Classes/MoorePartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Moore type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/Moore.html.name: Moore
Classes/Moore.html.abstract: Moore represents Moore machines that hold values of type V and handle inputs of type E.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow16ForNonEmptyArrayC.name: ForNonEmptyArray
Classes.html#/s:3Bow16ForNonEmptyArrayC.abstract: Witness for the NonEmptyArray<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForOptionC.name: ForOption
Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForOptionC.abstract: Witness for the Option<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow8ForPairKC.name: ForPairK
Classes.html#/s:3Bow8ForPairKC.abstract: Witness for the PairK<F, G, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/PairKPartial.html.name: PairKPartial
Classes/PairKPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the PairK type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/PairK.html.name: PairK
Classes/PairK.html.abstract: PairK is a product type for kinds. Represents a type where you hold both a Kind<F, A> and a Kind<G, A>.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForPairingC.name: ForPairing
Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForPairingC.abstract: Witness for the Pairing<F, G> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow14PairingPartialC.name: PairingPartial
Classes.html#/s:3Bow14PairingPartialC.abstract: Partial application of the Pairing type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/Pairing.html.name: Pairing
Classes/Pairing.html.abstract: The Pairing type represents a relationship between Functors F and G, where the sums in one can annihilate the products in the other.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow7ForSetKC.name: ForSetK
Classes.html#/s:3Bow7ForSetKC.abstract: Witness for the SetK<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/SetK.html.name: SetK
Classes/SetK.html.abstract: An unordered collection of unique elements, wrapped to act as a Higher Kinded Type.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow6ForSumC.name: ForSum
Classes.html#/s:3Bow6ForSumC.abstract: Witness for the Sum<F, G, V> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/SumPartial.html.name: SumPartial
Classes/SumPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Sum type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/Sum.html.name: Sum
Classes/Sum.html.abstract: The Sum type models a Comonad that contains two different Comonadic values, where only one of them can be selected at a given moment.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow13ForTrampolineC.name: ForTrampoline
Classes.html#/s:3Bow13ForTrampolineC.abstract: Witness for the Trampoline<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/Trampoline.html.name: Trampoline
Classes/Trampoline.html.abstract: The Trampoline type helps us overcome stack safety issues of recursive calls by transforming them into loops.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow7ForTreeC.name: ForTree
Classes.html#/s:3Bow7ForTreeC.abstract: Witness for the Tree<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/Tree.html.name: Tree
Classes/Tree.html.abstract: Tree represents a non-empty tree that allows node to have an arbitrary number of children.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow6ForTryC.name: ForTry
Classes.html#/s:3Bow6ForTryC.abstract: Witness for the Try<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow12ForValidatedC.name: ForValidated
Classes.html#/s:3Bow12ForValidatedC.abstract: Witness for the Validated<E, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/ValidatedPartial.html.name: ValidatedPartial
Classes/ValidatedPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Validated type constructor, ommitting the last parameter.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForYonedaC.name: ForYoneda
Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForYonedaC.abstract: Witness for the Yoneda data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/YonedaPartial.html.name: YonedaPartial
Classes/YonedaPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the Yoneda type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/Yoneda.html.name: Yoneda
Classes/Yoneda.html.abstract: This type implements the covariant form of the Yoneda lemma, stating that F is naturally isomorphic to Yoneda.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForZipperC.name: ForZipper
Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForZipperC.abstract: Witness for the Zipper<A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/Zipper.html.name: Zipper
Classes/Zipper.html.abstract: A Zipper is an array of elements focused on a specific element, which lets us move the focus around the array, and retrieve the elements to the left and right of the focus.

Classes/FirstOption.html.name: FirstOption
Classes/FirstOption.html.abstract: Wrapper class to represent a constant present first option.

Classes/LastOption.html.name: LastOption
Classes/LastOption.html.abstract: Wrapper class to represent a constant present last option.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForEitherTC.name: ForEitherT
Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForEitherTC.abstract: Witness for the EitherT<F, A, B> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/EitherTPartial.html.name: EitherTPartial
Classes/EitherTPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the EitherT type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/EitherT.html.name: EitherT
Classes/EitherT.html.abstract: The EitherT transformer represents the nesting of an Either value inside any other effect. It is equivalent to Kind<F, Either<A, B>>.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow7ForEnvTC.name: ForEnvT
Classes.html#/s:3Bow7ForEnvTC.abstract: Witness for the EnvT<E, W, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/EnvTPartial.html.name: EnvTPartial
Classes/EnvTPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the EnvT type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/EnvT.html.name: EnvT
Classes/EnvT.html.abstract: The environment Comonad Transformer. This Comonad Transformer extends the context of a value in the base Comonad with a global environment.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForOptionTC.name: ForOptionT
Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForOptionTC.abstract: Witness for the OptionT<F, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/OptionTPartial.html.name: OptionTPartial
Classes/OptionTPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the OptionT type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/OptionT.html.name: OptionT
Classes/OptionT.html.abstract: The OptionT transformer represents the nesting of an Option value inside any other effect. It is equivalent to Kind<F, Option<A>>.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForStateTC.name: ForStateT
Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForStateTC.abstract: Witness for the StateT<F, S, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/StateTPartial.html.name: StateTPartial
Classes/StateTPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the StateT type constructor, omitting the last type argument.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForStoreTC.name: ForStoreT
Classes.html#/s:3Bow9ForStoreTC.abstract: Witness for the StoreT<S, W, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/StoreTPartial.html.name: StoreTPartial
Classes/StoreTPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the StoreT type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/StoreT.html.name: StoreT
Classes/StoreT.html.abstract: The Store Comonad Transformer. This Comonad Transformer extends the context of a value in the base Comonad so that it depends on a position of the type of the state.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForTracedTC.name: ForTracedT
Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForTracedTC.abstract: Witness for the TracedT<M, W, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/TracedTPartial.html.name: TracedTPartial
Classes/TracedTPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the TracedT type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/TracedT.html.name: TracedT
Classes/TracedT.html.abstract: The cowriter Comonad Transformer. This Comonad Transformer extends the context of a value in the base Comonad so that the value depends on a monoidal position.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForWriterTC.name: ForWriterT
Classes.html#/s:3Bow10ForWriterTC.abstract: Witness for the WriterT<F, W, A> data type. To be used in simulated Higher Kinded Types.

Classes/WriterTPartial.html.name: WriterTPartial
Classes/WriterTPartial.html.abstract: Partial application of the WriterT type constructor, omitting the last parameter.

Classes/WriterT.html.name: WriterT
Classes/WriterT.html.abstract: WriterT transformer represents operations that accumulate values through a computation or effect, without reading them.

Classes.html#/s:3Bow17BindingExpressionC.name: BindingExpression
Classes.html#/s:3Bow17BindingExpressionC.abstract: A binding expression is one of the instructions of the form x <- fx in a monad comprehension.

Classes/BoundVar.html.name: BoundVar
Classes/BoundVar.html.abstract: A bound variable is a variable to be used in a monad comprehesion to bind the produced values by a monadic effect.

Global Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.
